subject: Attention Customer,
body:
Attention Customer,
I write to inform you that the Management OF ACCESS BANK ( PLC ) Of
REPUBLIC NIGERIA.Wishes to inform you that we are in receipt of our
ATM CARD issued in your favor with amount of $12.8 MILLIOM USD
only,from DHL and they told us to cancel the ATM CARD, That you have
refused to send the mailing fee of your ATM CARD.
And you are now advised to contact our Director General and tell him
what is going on and why you asked DHL to destroy your ATM MASTER
CARD. Contact our DIRECTOR GENERAL Dr.Tony Moore, and 
send your name,
address and telephone number to him in case you still want to receive
your ATM CARD
;Hence he will cancel your ATM CARD.
So contact DR.TONY MOORE now we have been waiting to hear from you
first,To know if you still want to receive your ATM CARD or not.
Before we will take any action. So feel free to get in touch with our
BANK DIRECTOR GENERAL DR.TONY MOORE, because your ATM CARD is with him
now. And ask him to send you the ATM CARD without any delay if you
still want your ATM CARD.
customerserviceunit003@yandex.com
Thank you.
Mr.Mack White

subject: Re: Attention Customer,
body:
Hello White,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! An ATM card with such a large amount of money issued in my favor? That's something I never expected.

I'm not sure why DHL would say that I asked them to destroy the ATM card. I don't recall ever making such a request. It's all very confusing.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did this come about? And who exactly is Director General Moore?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Francisco

subject: Attn; Beneficiary,Francisco
body:
Attn; Beneficiary,Francisco 
The VISA ATM card was contracted and powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE. 
The VISA ATM card is credited with the sum of us$12.8Million, it is 
already loaded into the Gold Master Card that you can use to access 
your funds at any ATM/location in the world and we have concluded a 
delivery agreement with the courier companies below and their delivery 
time is indicated below. 
Your total funds worth us$12.8Million will be delivered to your 
home through any company of your choice from those mentioned below, so 
please keep us posted. 
1) UPS=6hrs/$50 
2) FedEx=5h/$75 
3) DHL 3h/$100 
courieroffice.courier@yandex.com
Best Regards 
DR.TONY MOORE

subject: Re: Attention Customer,
body:

The VISA ATM card was contracted and powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE. 
The VISA ATM card is credited with the sum of us$12.8Million, it is

delivery agreement with the courier companies below and their delivery

DR.TONY MOORE

subject: Re: Attn; Beneficiary,Francisco
body:
Hello MOORE,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this VISA ATM card powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE. I'm curious, how does it work exactly? And what are the benefits of using this card?

Also, you mentioned that the card is already loaded and can be used at any ATM location worldwide. That sounds very convenient! But I wonder, are there any fees or charges associated with using the card?

As for the delivery options, could you please provide more details? For instance, how long would it take for the card to be delivered if I choose UPS or DHL? And are there any delivery charges?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Francisco

subject: Re: Attention Customer,
body:
Hello MOORE,

Thank you for your message. It's exciting to hear about the VISA ATM card powered by GOLD CARD WORLD WIDE. I'm curious, how does this process work? And how did my name come up for this opportunity?

Also, could you please provide more details about the delivery agreement with courier companies? What are their respective charges and delivery times?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Francisco

subject: Hello Beneficiary,Francisco
body:
Hello Beneficiary,Francisco 
Thank you for yours e-mail kindly is well noted. 
I wish to inform you that your transaction has been finalized and your ATM Bank Card will be sent to you soon. With this, you can cash your funds through any bank payment outlet in your Area or anywhere in the whole world. Note: that the card will be officially forwarded to your nominated address via our official courier service  which will ensure delivery in 2 – 3(days)
Best Regards 
DR.TONY MOORE

subject: Re: Hello Beneficiary,Francisco
body:
Hello Moore,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited to hear about the ATM Bank Card! Could you please tell me more about how this works? And also, is there any fee associated with using this card?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Francisco

subject: Re: Hello Beneficiary,Francisco
body:
Hello Francisco

home through any company of your choice from those mentioned below, so 
please keep us posted. 
1) UPS=6hrs/$50 
2) FedEx=5h/$75 
3) DHL 3h/$100 courieroffice.courier@yandex.com (mailto:courieroffice.courier@yandex.com)

DR.TONY MOORE

subject: Re: Hello Beneficiary,Francisco
body:
Hello MOORE,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that my funds will be delivered to my home. I'm curious, how does this process work? And why are we using a delivery service instead of a bank transfer?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Francisco
